mapper.sql: shps.ht_package_specification_id,shps.package_specification_id, shps.package_specification_code, shps.package_specification_name, shps.package_specification_desc, shps.package_specification_quantity, shps.material_id, shps.barcode_rule_id, shps.packing_unit_id, shps.status, shps.create_user_id, shps.create_time, shps.modified_user_id, shps.modified_time, shps.is_delete, shps.option1, shps.option2, shps.option3
mapper.select:
select , su.user_name AS create_user_name, sus.user_name AS modified_user_name, spu.packing_unit_name, spu.packing_unit_desc, sm.material_code, sm.material_desc,sm.version, sbr.barcode_rule from fantech_imes.smt_ht_package_specification shps LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_barcode_rule sbr ON shps.barcode_rule_id = sbr.barcode_rule_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_material sm ON shps.material_id = sm.material_id LEFT JOIN fantech_imes.smt_packing_unit spu ON shps.packing_unit_id = spu.packing_unit_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user su ON shps.create_user_id = su.user_id LEFT JOIN ocean.sys_user sus ON shps.modified_user_id = sus.user_id
and date_format(shps.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') BETWEEN #{startTime} AND #{endTime}
and shps.package_specification_code like CONCAT('%', #{packageSpecificationCode}, '%')
and shps.package_specification_name like CONCAT('%', #{packageSpecificationName}, '%')
and shps.package_specification_desc like CONCAT('%', #{packageSpecificationDesc}, '%')
and shps.packing_unit_id=#{packingUnitId}
and spu.packing_unit_name like CONCAT('%', #{packingUnitName}, '%')
and spu.packing_unit_desc like CONCAT('%', #{packingUnitDesc}, '%')
order by shps.modified_time desc
